quotes.text: The most precious gift we can offer anyone is our attention. When mindfulness embraces those we love, they will bloom like flowers.
quotes.author: Thích Nhất Hạnh

quotes.text: The awareness of our own strength makes us modest.
quotes.author: Paul Cézanne

quotes.text: The key to growth is the introduction of higher dimensions of consciousness into our awareness.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.text: Meditation is the dissolution of thoughts in eternal awareness or Pure consciousness without objectification, knowing without thinking, merging finitude in infinity.
quotes.author: Voltaire

quotes.text: The decisions of our past are the architects of our present.
quotes.author: Dan Brown

quotes.text: Don't ruin the present with the ruined past.
quotes.author: Ellen Gilchrist

quotes.text: If we are not fully ourselves, truly in the present moment, we miss everything.
quotes.author: Thích Nhất Hạnh

quotes.text: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, today is God's gift, that's why we call it the present.
quotes.author: Joan Rivers

quotes.text: You cannot find yourself by going into the past. You can find yourself by coming into the present.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: If we open a quarrel between past and present, we shall find that we have lost the future.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The past has no power to stop you from being present now. Only your grievance about the past can do that.
quotes.author: Eckhart Tolle

quotes.text: Yesterday is history. Tomorrow is a mystery. And today? Today is a gift. That is why we call it the present.
quotes.author: Babatunde Olatunji

quotes.text: Reflect on your present blessings, of which every man has many; not on your past misfortunes, of which all men have some.
quotes.author: Charles Dickens

quotes.text: In rivers, the water that you touch is the last of what has passed and the first of that which comes; so with present time.
quotes.author: Leonardo da Vinci

quotes.text: Laws alone can not secure freedom of expression; in order that every man present his views without penalty there must be spirit of tolerance in the entire population.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Let the future tell the truth and evaluate each one according to his work and accomplishments. The present is theirs; the future, for which I have really worked, is mine.
quotes.author: Nikola Tesla
